'''Acronis Rescue Media''' is a [[Live CD]] produced by [[Acronis]]. <br>
It is not sold directly by Acronis, but can be created by [[Acronis True Image]] or Acronis Disk Director Suite. <br>
It is not sold directly by Acronis, but can be created by [[Acronis True Image]] or Acronis Disk Director Suite. <br>
It can include both [[Acronis True Image]] and Acronis Disk Director Suite if both programs are installed on the computer. It can also include Acronis Drive Cleanser if Acronis True Image is installed.
It can include both [[Acronis True Image]] and Acronis Disk Director Suite if both programs are installed on the computer. It can also include Acronis Drive Cleanser if Acronis True Image is installed.
